products.name: McLaren P1
products.description: The McLaren P1 is a limited-production plug-in hybrid sports car produced by British automobile manufacturer McLaren Automotive.

products.name: McLaren Senna
products.description: The McLaren Senna is a limited-production mid-engine sports car produced by British automobile manufacturer McLaren Automotive.

products.name: McLaren 675LT Spider
products.description: The McLaren 675LT is a track-focused evolution of the McLaren 650S. Produced by British automobile manufacturer McLaren Automotive.

products.name: Ferrari 488 Spider
products.description: The Ferrari 488 Spider is a mid-engine convertible sports car produced by the Italian automobile manufacturer Ferrari.

products.name: McLaren 720S
products.description: The McLaren 720S is a sports car produced by British automobile manufacturer McLaren Automotive. It is the second all-new car in the McLaren Super Series.

products.name: Lamborghini Huracan
products.description: The Lamborghini Huracán is a sports car manufactured by Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini replacing the Gallardo.

products.name: Lamborghini Murcielago
products.description: The Lamborghini Murciélago is a sports car produced by Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini between 2001 and 2010. Successor to the Diablo.

products.name: Audi R8 V10 Spyder
products.description: The Audi R8 Spyder is a mid-engine, 2-seater convertible sports car, which uses Audi's trademark quattro permanent all-wheel drive system.

products.name: Ferrari 360 Spider
products.description: The Ferrari 360 (Type F131) is a two-seater, mid-engine, rear wheel drive sports car manufactured by Italian automotive manufacturer Ferrari from 1999 to 2005.

products.name: Lamborghini Aventador SVJ
products.description: The Lamborghini Aventador is a mid-engine sports car produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini.

products.name: SLS AMG GT Black Series
products.description: The Mercedes-AMG GT is a sports car produced in coupé and roadster bodystyles by German automobile manufacturer Mercedes-AMG.

products.name: Porsche 911 Carrera S
products.description: The German grown Porsche 911 is a two-door, 2+2 high performance rear-engined sports car. It has a rear-mounted flat-six engine and all round independent suspension.
